text: Tram Iv Teuk (November 30, 1948 - June 1, 2021) was a Cambodian politician. He was the Minister of Posts and Telecommunications from 2016 until 2020. From 2003 until 2008 and from 2018 until his death, he was a member of the National Assembly. Tram died on June 1, 2021 at the age of 72.Senior Minister, His Excellency Tram Iv Tek, passes away ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cambodian politicians
title: Tram Iv Tek
